summary: The diff implements all four requirements: logo replacement (REQ-77), React Query cache optimization (REQ-78/79), and loading indicators (REQ-80). Logo files are replaced in AppLayout and SignedOutScreen. All three mutation hook files (tasks.ts, clients.ts, assignees.ts) add optimistic updates with onMutate/onError/onSettled callbacks and targeted invalidation. All three form dialogs add isPending checks, disabled inputs, loading button text, and prevented closure during mutations.

hallucinated_features.description: urlParams.ts utility file added or modified with extensive URL parameter parsing and session storage functions
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention URL parameter handling, session storage utilities, or any requirement to modify urlParams.ts. This appears to be unrelated infrastructure work.
